programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, é convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que está desaparecido há vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua família.

programme.title: Quatro Confissões, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: Um trapaceiro, um padre e um minerador esperam, em uma estação em ruínas, a chegada do trem.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: Raça Brava, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: No Velho Oeste Bill Tyler, um comerciante de peles, tenta achar com seu melhor amigo, Henry Frapp, o lendário vale conhecido pela enorme quantidade de animais para caçar.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Uma Última Vez, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer é um dentista solitário na Flórida. Quando confrontado por uma figura do passado trazendo notícias, ele precisa embarcar em uma jornada de descobertas fantásticas e também desesperadoras, que vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: A Maldição de Humpty Dumpty, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma mulher mais velha com demência se reencontra com uma boneca de seu passado. Em pouco tempo, ela começa a lembrar que esta boneca tem um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Nazistas no Centro da Terra, (2012, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Pesquisadores na Antártica são sequestrados por uma equipe de tropas mascaradas. Eles são arrastados no subsolo para um continente escondido no centro da terra.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Mega Python vs. Gatoroid, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois que uma espécie de píton gigante invade os pântanos, os guardas florestais criam jacarés mutantes para combater a ameaça. Logo, a batalha entre enormes pítons e enormes jacarés ameaça toda a Flórida.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi são perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.

programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um helicóptero aterrissa na frente de Jotaro e seu grupo no Egito, mas não parece trazer a ajuda que Joseph pediu.

programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 1

programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Khnum do Ongo e o Thoth do Bongo

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente após tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para proteger a cidade, Jotaro quer destruir o misterioso arco e flecha que despertou o poder do Stand de Angelo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Rei Da Montanha, (2022, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura da mitologia nórdica, Espen 'Ash Lad' embarca, junto a seus irmãos, em uma perigosa missão para resgatar a princesa de um vilão conhecido como o Rei da Montanha — com o intuito de ganhar a recompensa e salvar sua família da ruína.

programme.title: O Menino e o Urso, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos campos gelados do norte do Canadá do norte, Luke descobre que um filhote de urso polar jovem foi separado de sua mãe e tenta encontrar uma maneira de reunir os dois.

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palácio de Aladim, (1998, Children)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, é confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gênio, que o atrai de volta ao século VIII, onde deve unir forças com Ali Babá para salvar toda a Arábia do irmão maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Children)
programme.desc: A viagem para Disney foi cancelada. Mac e seu pai, Sean, vão a uma cidade com um lago. Eles encontrarão aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguições e bandidos. Uma história de amizade para toda a família.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Halvdan é um menino diferente, longe do tipo ideal de viking para sua aldeia. Quando ele conhece Meia, a filha do chefe da tribo inimiga, começa uma incrível aventura sobre amizade e superação de diferenças.

programme.title: Ultraman - Mega Batalha na Galáxia Ultra, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Por 45 anos, eles protegeram a Terra, um planeta que os lembra de seu passado antigo. O Ultraman, da Terra da Luz (também conhecido como Planet Ultra) na Nebulosa M78.

programme.title: Os Dragões De Camelot, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Uma feiticeira cruel assume Camelot e usa três dragões mortais para caçar os restantes Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda.

programme.title: Expedição Kon-Tiki, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da água e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construída com um design antigo.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Halvdan é um menino diferente, longe do tipo ideal de viking para sua aldeia. Quando ele conhece Meia, a filha do chefe da tribo inimiga, começa uma incrível aventura sobre amizade e superação de diferenças.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori é encontrada morta, sua irmã Windsor inicia uma investigação por conta própria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Manji é um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldiçoado com a imortalidade após uma lendária batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que está movida pelo ódio e pela sede de vingança.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori é encontrada morta, sua irmã Windsor inicia uma investigação por conta própria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: A Night In Casablanca, (1946, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Marx Brothers are employed at a hotel in post-war Casablanca, where a ring of Nazis are trying to recover a cache of stolen treasure.

programme.title: Flower Drum Song, (1961, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls, (1955, Musical)
programme.desc: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

programme.title: Kiss Me, Stupid, (1964, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In this comic gem from the legendary Billy Wilder and his long-time writing partner I.A.L. Diamond, Dean Martin is a famous singer targeted by two would-be songwriters who encourage a waitress (Kim Novak) to coerce Dino into a song-buying mood.

programme.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: The Ladies Man, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: After being jilted by his gal, Herbert swears off romance and is determined to live his life as a confirmed bachelor. However, he then finds employment at a Hollywood boardinghouse for women, and the female residents go wild over the new help!

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes’ assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryan’s act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: East-West tensions erupt when the CIA suspects that renegade Russian scientists are developing more nuclear weapons.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: 20 years ago, evil escaped incarceration in the form of Michael Myers, leading to a bloody killing spree on Halloween. Now, Michael has returned to terrorize a new generation, starting with original final-girl Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis).

programme.title: Halloween VIII: Resurrection, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of college students win a contest to spend the night in the childhood home of brutal serial killer Michael Myers. They expect a few scares, but none of them are prepared for what awaits them in this frightening follow-up to HALLOWEEN H20.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Rage: Carrie 2, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Rachel (Emily Bergl) is a high school misfit who gets caught in the middle of a prank orchestrated by a group of jocks...a prank that turns deadly. And when they target her, it triggers a powder-keg of anger, unleashing Rachel's horrifying powers!

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: The Creeper terrorizes a group of varsity basketball players, cheerleaders and coaches who are stranded on a highway after their bus breaks down. Fighting their own fears and prejudices the group of athletes are forced to come together to stay alive.

programme.title: Flatliners, (1990, Science fiction)

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)

programme.title: The Tuxedo, (2002, Action)

programme.title: Canadian Bacon, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Falling approval ratings and a sagging economy, cause a desperate U.S. president to turn America against its most unlikely enemy, Canada. A Niagara Falls sheriff and his band of misfit deputies invade Canada leaving the President's plans in shambles.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap, (1984, Mockumentaries)
programme.desc: Undoubtedly the funniest film ever made about rock and roll, Rob Reiner's satire about an over-the-hill heavy metal band is a priceless look at the music business and it's madness.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: Fools Rush In, (1997, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Matthew Perry stars as Alex Whitman, a New Yorker sent to Las Vegas to oversee a construction project. There he meets Isabel Fuentes, and some serious chemistry brings them together for one night. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Goin' South, (1978, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: JACK NICHOLSON plays Henry Moon, a third-rate outlaw, in this romantic comedy set in the 1860s.

programme.title: Wagons East!, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: They came for gold, but now they'll settle for indoor plumbing. John Candy and Richard Lewis star in this hilariously unconventional look at the legendary West.

programme.title: Outlaw Johnny Black, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hell-bent on avenging the death of his father, Johnny Black vows to gun down Brett Clayton.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay and executive producer Steven Spielberg comes a thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons. When their epic struggle comes to Earth, Sam Witwicky becomes mankind's last chance for survival.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The battle for Earth continues when college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers and must join in their continued battle against the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay and executive producer Steven Spielberg comes a thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons. When their epic struggle comes to Earth, Sam Witwicky becomes mankind's last chance for survival.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

programme.title: London Road, (2015, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In 2006, the murder of five prostitutes made one quiet Ipswich street notorious. When a local resident was charged and then convicted of the murders, the community grappled with what it meant to be at the epicentre of this tragedy.

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: When a power-crazed despot schemes to buy California from Mexico, it takes two Zorros--the legendary Don Diego de la Vega and his chosen successor Alejandro Murrieta, a dashing bandit-turned-hero-- to defeat the tyrant's unscrupulous plans.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: In 1776 South Carolina, widower and legendary war hero Benjamin Martin (Mel Gibson) finds himself thrust into the midst of the American Revolutionary War as he helplessly watches his family torn apart by the savage forces of the British Redcoats.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: I Think We're Alone Now, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: The carefully crafted paradise of the last man on Earth is threatened by the arrival of a mysterious interloper.

programme.title: Tucker & Dale Vs. Evil, (2010, Comedy)

programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: In this gleeful mashup, Anna and her friends must fight – and sing – their way through a zombie invasion to reach the supposed safety of their school, not knowing if their parents and friends will still be alive when they get there.

programme.title: Super, (2011, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Rainn Wilson, Elliot Page, Liv Tyler, and Kevin Bacon bring to life this super-entertaining action fantasy about a regular joe turned homegrown masked avenger.

programme.desc: The carefully crafted paradise of the last man on Earth is threatened by the arrival of a mysterious interloper.

programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: My Heart Can't Beat Unless You Tell It To, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Dwight and his sister Jessie reach a crossroads over what to do about their younger brother Thomas, a sickly child with a mysterious affliction.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)

programme.title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark, (2010, Horror)

programme.title: Quarantine, (2008, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!

programme.title: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier's stunning true identity! The Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!

programme.title: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!

programme.title: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Liar! Usoland on the Run!

programme.title: Usopp runs into trouble in his battle with Treebol, and flashback sheds light on how a young Kyros made the shocking transition from murderer to one of King Riku's most trusted men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!

programme.title: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo's chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!

programme.title: Toys all across Dressrosa regain their human form, a flood of forgotten memories return, and Kyros launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend is Back! Kyros' All-out Blow!

programme.title: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo's clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!

programme.title: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army - Sabo!

programme.title: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!

programme.title: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The 500 Million Berry Man! Target: Usoland!

programme.title: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steady Progress! Luffy’s Army vs. Pica!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Hidden far underground, Kin'emon finds his old friend Kanjuro whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!

programme.title: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Señor Pink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro's Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Little People's Princess! Captive Mansherry!

programme.title: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius' exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!

programme.title: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Risking Their Lives! Luffy is the Trump Card for Victory!

programme.title: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!

programme.title: Usopp uses Viola's Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster, and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp's ammunition has been specially designed for this situation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!

programme.title: The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy's own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Señor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law's Ultimate Stratagem!

programme.title: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!

programme.title: With Fujitora's stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law's traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad Memories! Law, the Boy from the White Town!

programme.title: Law's attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he's accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon's mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law's life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy's Stormy Past!

programme.title: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon's Journey of Life!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose…

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: From Paris With Love, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A low-ranking intelligence operative working with the U.S. Ambassador in France takes on more than he bargained for when he partners with a wisecracking, fast-shooting, high-ranking U.S. agent who’s been sent to Paris to stop a terrorist attack

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Dreamgirls, (2006, Musical)
programme.desc: With showstopping performances by a star-studded cast, Dreamgirls soars with the amazing story of three female singers who learn that anything is possible when you hold on to your dreams.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
